title: T206 SGC 40 HOF Portraits for trade
author: Chesbro41

posts.post_title: T206 SGC 40 HOF Portraits for trade
posts.post_content:
Considering trading away my near set of T206 HOF portraits... Green Cobb in particular is really nice for a 40. I am not looking to sell these right now.

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=1036&userset=4473[/url]

I am looking for the following SPECIFIC cards in return, some would require the whole lot, some would require a combination etc.

1921 E121 80 Ruth - SGC 40 or 30 
1933 Goudey Ruth (Red or Yellow Batting) - SGC 50
1934 Goudey Gehrig (Port) - SGC 50
1938 Goudey DiMaggio - SGC 50
1951 Bowman Mantle - SGC 50/60

[url]davegeorge76@yahoo.com[/url]

David,
if you decided to break the group up for sale, I would like first crack at the Beckley, Wallace and Willis.
Thanks, 
Tony
